name: transfer-log-report
label: GRP-5: Transfer Log Report Validation
description: Validate existence of data referenced within a transfer report log within a given project. This Gear outputs a csv file with the fields: 'error', 'path',  'type', 'resolved', 'label', '_id'.

template.description: A yaml template file detailing how to read the transfer log.

file_type.description: File Type of output report (json or csv).

case_insensitive.description: Whether to make post-regex comparisons case-insensitive.

filename.description: Name for output report (optional, defaults to 'transfer-log-report').

author: Flywheel
